description: Generalized nim sum n + n in base 4.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Nim-sums
formula: Generalized nim sum m + n in base q: write m and n in base q and add mod q with no carries, e.g. 5 + 8 in base 3 = "21" + "22" = "10" = 1.a(n) = 2*(n-a(floor(n/2))). a(n) = 2*A063694(n). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 23 2003Equals A088442 - 1. - Chris Groer (cgroer(AT)math.uga.edu), Nov 10, 2003a(n) = n + A053985(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 27 2003a(n) = A063695(2*n+1). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 26 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
